.. _installation:

Installation
=============

*It is suggested that you sandbox ford in a virtualenv.*

Get the Source (via Git)
------------------------

From Github:

    $ git clone http://github.com/citruspi/ford.git

From Bit Bucket:

    $ git clone https://bitbucket.org/citruspi/ford.git

It doesn't matter which you get it from - they'll both be updated together.

Dependencies (via Pip)
----------------------

ford is dependent on several Python packages. To install them, run

    $ pip install -r requirements.txt
